resources.string: Hello, we are here to make your life healthier and happier
We will ask couple of questions to better understand your vitamin need.
Select the top health concerns* \n (up to 5)
Write any specific allergies or sensitivity towards specific things.(optional)
Is your daily exposure to sun is limited?
Do you current smoke (Tobacco or marijuana)
On average, how many alcoholic beverages do you have a week?
